pages.title: Fetish Binding
pages.text: A witch may use the $(item)Rite of Binding$() to bind spectral creatures to a $(item)fetish$() to create permanent effects.$(2br)The following pages show which beings must be bound for which effect.

pages.title: Hosts
pages.text: Hosts are small blocks that can be bound to spectral entities to have supernatural powers.$(br2)Very few artifacts are able to trap such volatile beings.
$(p)Even though the fetishes are different, the effects manifested will be the same, as they depend on the beings and not the fetish itself.

pages.title: Summon Death
pages.description: In your quest to command the undead, you have crossed a line unseen. The air grows cold, a whisper breaks the deafening silence. Death steps forth to reclaim its dominion.
pages.secret_tooltip: This effect is secret and won't show in this book for players that did not discover it
